countryOfBirth.description: Country where the individual was born

familyName.description: Contains the non-chosen or inherited name. Also known as last name in the Western context

formattedName.description: A fully formatted name in one string with all of its pieces in their proper place and all of the necessary punctuation. Useful for specific contexts (Chinese, Japanese, Korean,…)

fullName.description: Full name flatten (first, middle, and last names)

legalName.description: Legal name or birth name (name one has for official purposes)

location.description: Temporary current location od the individual (may be used if the individual has approved its sharing)

placeOfBirth.description: Reference to the place where the individual was born

preferredGivenName.description: Contains the chosen name by which the individual prefers to be addressed. Note: This name may be a name other than a given name, such as a nickname

title.description: Useful for titles (aristocratic, social,...) Pr, Dr, Sir, ...

mediumType.description: Type of the contact medium, such as: email address, telephone number, postal address

preferred.description: If true, indicates that is the preferred contact medium

contactType.description: The type of contact, for example: phone number such as mobile, fixed home, fixed office. postal address such as shipping instalation…

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the contact

phoneNumber.description: The primary phone number of the contact

socialNetworkId.description: Identifier as a member of a social network
